# outline-heading



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                             | Type                                                                                                             | Default  |
| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `level`      | `level`       | The heading tag to apply: 1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4                                              | `1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6`                                                                                     | `2`      |
| `levelSize`  | `level-size`  | The heading level size to apply. Optional override to default styles for a given level  | `"2xl" \| "3xl" \| "4xl" \| "5xl" \| "6xl" \| "7xl" \| "8xl" \| "9xl" \| "base" \| "lg" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'3xl'`  |
| `levelStyle` | `level-style` | The heading level style to apply. Optional override to default styles for a given level | `"black" \| "bold" \| "extrabold" \| "extralight" \| "light" \| "medium" \| "normal" \| "semibold" \| "thin"`    | `'bold'` |
| `sub`        | `sub`         | The smaller, decorative subheading style                                                | `boolean`                                                                                                        | `false`  |
